attributes.action: Revise the Audiovisual Media Services Regulations 2014 amendments to the 2003 Communications Act (un ban porn)
attributes.additional_details:
Revise the Audiovisual Media Services Regulations 2014 amendments to the 2003 Communications Act

This has just gone in to effect banning English company's (and people) for selling/distributing and watching certain types of porn:

Spanking
Caning
Aggressive whipping
Penetration by any object "associated with violence"
Physical or verbal abuse (regardless of  if consensual)
Urolagnia (known as "water sports")
Female ejaculation
Strangulation
Facesitting
Fisting

Not only is this sexist eg: Facesitting banned but Facefucking is still OK, it is incredibly short sighted and ignorant with other BDSM activity's such as Blood play and Emetophilia AKA: vomit fetish Still allowed which makes no sense.

In short: not only are these changes Sexist and ignorant but also very worrying. Once censorship starts where does it stop?
This wrong must be put right.

And so I petition the Government to take a look at this Act and undo the amendments made.
